statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history, customer_preferences FROM CustomerSupport;
SELECT customer_name, customer_preferences, customer_id, purchase_history FROM CustomerSupport;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupport WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_preferences FROM CustomerSupport WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CustomerSupport WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupport WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM CustomerSupport WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM CustomerSupport WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_preferences FROM CustomerSupport WHERE customer_id < 4 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_preferences FROM CustomerSupport WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_histories ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_histories WHERE customer_id = 123456
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE email_notifications = TRUE
SELECT customer_id, preferred_language FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_language = 'English'
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_histories ORDER BY interaction_type ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM customer_histories WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_histories WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_histories WHERE interaction_type = 'query' AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM customer_histories JOIN customer_preferences ON customer_histories.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id WHERE preferred_language = 'English';
SELECT customer_id, preferred_language, preferred_time_zone FROM customer_preferences WHERE email_notifications = true ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_histories;
SELECT customer_id, history FROM customer_histories ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents WHERE agent_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_histories WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, history FROM customer_histories ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference = 'VIP';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM support_agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_histories JOIN customer_preferences ON customer_histories.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerHistory;
SELECT CustomerID, InteractionDate, InteractionType FROM CustomerHistory WHERE CustomerID = 1;
SELECT CustomerID, PreferenceType, PreferenceValue FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY CustomerID DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerAgents WHERE AgentRole = 'Support';
SELECT AgentID, AgentName, AgentRole FROM CustomerAgents WHERE AgentName LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerHistory ORDER BY InteractionDate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT CustomerID, InteractionDate, InteractionType FROM CustomerHistory WHERE CustomerID = 1001;
SELECT AgentName, AgentRole FROM CustomerAgents WHERE AgentRole = 'Support';
SELECT CustomerID, PreferenceType, PreferenceValue FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE CustomerID = 2002;
SELECT AgentID, InteractionType, InteractionDetails FROM AgentInteractions ORDER BY InteractionDate ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' AND interaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, agent_status FROM agents WHERE agent_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK);
SELECT agent_name, assignment_date FROM agents INNER JOIN agent_assignments ON agents.agent_id = agent_assignments.agent_id WHERE assignment_status = 'Active';
